word:
"Watch and pray, that ye enter not into temptation." There are stern battles for you to fight. You should put on 
                                                                           125
the whole armor of righteousness and prove yourselves strong and true in your Redeemer's service. God wants no idlers in His field, but colaborers with Christ, vigilant sentinels at their posts, valiant soldiers of the cross, ready to do and dare all things for the cause in which they are enlisted.
